definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: he was skilful at sketching. Suddenly, Abe suggested to go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 他素描畫得很嫺熟，突然，艾貝提議去滑雪。

sentences.english: The way I've tried to depict it.
The picture was cleverly restored and showed up its original colouring.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在給一套素描畫着色。

sentences.english: To re-enforce the lighting, some shadows are added (one of the best ways to describe form is by casting shadows onto it).
sentences.chinese: 我們現在是在描畫的線條和一些有用的圖形上繪製。

sentences.english: The charcoal effect simulates a charcoal artist's impression of the image.
sentences.chinese: 炭筆效果模擬出該圖像的素描畫。

sentences.english: With my bamboo pen holding bright stars, the moon I portray.
sentences.chinese: 用我那鑲着明亮星辰的竹筆，我把月亮描畫。

sentences.english: Love autumn leaves painted youth, love dream Yin with hide sadness.
sentences.chinese: 愛的秋葉描畫了青春，情的夢吟點綴了躲藏的悲涼。

sentences.english: I paint you and fashion  you ever with my love longings.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠用愛戀的渴想來描畫你。

sentences.english: The wounded limb has now been amputated and Mr Kossoff is no longer painting the tree.
sentences.chinese: 傷枝現已被切斷，並且，科索夫大師不會再描畫這樹。

sentences.english: The clown had lipsticked circles on his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 小丑在臉頰上描畫出了圓圈。

sentences.english: By putting thin paper over the map, John traced it.
sentences.chinese: 約翰把薄紙鋪在地圖上照着描畫。

sentences.english: Softly drawing it can create the natura eye shape, makes the eyebrow is more vividly. It is worth for you to have it.
sentences.chinese: 輕鬆描畫自然眉形，使之更加自然生動值得擁有。

sentences.english: All the soldiers depicted represent different races.
sentences.chinese: 所描畫的士兵代表了來自不同的種族。

sentences.english: Cartoons showed the Minister as a long-nosed Pinocchio.
sentences.chinese: 漫畫把部長描畫成長鼻子皮諾曹。

sentences.english: Artists with a variety of colors, abstract strokes depicting the scene of this winter.
sentences.chinese: 畫家用多樣的色彩，抽象的筆法描畫了這幅冬日景象。

sentences.english: Comes with a built-in slanted brush to help blend colour and shape for precise, defined brows.
sentences.chinese: 附有內置式斜向眉刷，有助於拌色和精確描畫眉形。

definition: to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
(textiles) to scour/to degum (silk)/variant of 精煉|精炼[jing1 lian4]
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
